Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Tranquility Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Riverdell Way and Tranquility Way.
Room.LongDescription: Tranquility Way is a short street running east and west through the northern section of town, intersecting Riverdell Way, which runs north and south. There is a large forest formed on the west side of the road, interrupted only by a few small streets which cut through it. The Guard Barracks are located to the northeast and the Brunskid Trader's Guild is located to the southeast.
